original: 《 流放 》被流放的武將會對國家心生怨懟不滿，長達數年之久，短期內難以再次招募。若非國家冗員過多、財政吃緊，請謹慎執行流放指令！
text: "Exile" The exiled generals are resentful and dissatisfied with the country for several years and it is difficult to recruit again in the short term. If the country does not have too many staff and financial constraints, please be cautious to implement the exile order!
